name: data_storage_api
description: The purpose of this project is to be an API that a user can interact with to CRUD various personal data. This personal data can be anything from notes, contacts, places, memories, and anything else, there are no limitations. A future goal is that this data can then be accessed and displayed graphically by other fronend applications.

scripts.verify: npm run test && npm run lint

author: Gavin Vaske
